about_the_game:
Ultimate Fluid is an interactive 3D live wallpaper. You can control and interact Stunning Fluid Effects with your mouse on your desktop. Smooth and realistic fluid effects can let you relax.

Features

  • Support Workshop,One-Click download online Fluid themes
  • Support Custom Theme, many editing options.
  • Support interact with mouse.
  • Support Pause Mode - You can pause wallpaper when you need 100% power for your games.
  • Support Compatibility Mode - You can uses UltimateFluid with any other live wallpaper software,etc: WallpaperEngine,RainWallpaper.
  • Optimization - reduced equipment requirements. Low CPU usage.
  • Multi, wide, 4K screens support - You can choose one of the screens or extend the wallpaper to all screens. Works smooth at 4K.
  • Support Taskbar Aero Blur or fully transparent (for Win10) .
  • Support Windows 7/8/8.1/10

FAQ

Q: Why can't I see the desktop icon?
A: 1. Make sure your Windows had enabled Aero
2. Adjust Windows System "System Properties>>Performance Options>>Visual Effects" to "Adjust for best appearance"
3. If you have Integrated graphics card,please set the UltimateFluid.exe run with the Integrated graphics card.
4. Please add UltimateFluid.exe and CoreHost.exe in App folder Path to your AntiVirus Software's Trust-White-List and Restart computer

Q: Can I use UltimateFluid with WallpaperEngine/RainWallpaper at the same time?
A: YES! Just enable the "Compatibility Mode" option at Tray Icon PopupMenu (Screen Bottom-Right corner,near by your WIFI icon).

Q: How to cancel “TopMost” mode?
A: Just uncheck the "TopMost" option at Tray Icon PopupMenu (Screen Bottom-Right corner,near by your WIFI icon).


Q: How to remove Steam Hook?
A: Right click the UltimateFluid tray icon (Screen Bottom-Right corner,near by your WIFI icon) and select the menu item "Preferences..." ,Uncheck the "Enable Steam Support", Restart UltimateFluid.


Q: How to Exit/Shutdown UltimateFluid?
A:1. You can exit UltimateFluid from tray icon menu "Exit" (Screen Bottom-Right corner,near by your WIFI icon).
2. if can not found the tray icon, please open the system TaskMgr to kill the processes "UltimateFluid.exe"
detailed_description:
UltimateDesktop COLLECTION



About the Software

Ultimate Fluid is an interactive 3D live wallpaper. You can control and interact Stunning Fluid Effects with your mouse on your desktop. Smooth and realistic fluid effects can let you relax.

Features

  • Support Workshop,One-Click download online Fluid themes
  • Support Custom Theme, many editing options.
  • Support interact with mouse.
  • Support Pause Mode - You can pause wallpaper when you need 100% power for your games.
  • Support Compatibility Mode - You can uses UltimateFluid with any other live wallpaper software,etc: WallpaperEngine,RainWallpaper.
  • Optimization - reduced equipment requirements. Low CPU usage.
  • Multi, wide, 4K screens support - You can choose one of the screens or extend the wallpaper to all screens. Works smooth at 4K.
  • Support Taskbar Aero Blur or fully transparent (for Win10) .
  • Support Windows 7/8/8.1/10

FAQ

Q: Why can't I see the desktop icon?
A: 1. Make sure your Windows had enabled Aero
2. Adjust Windows System "System Properties>>Performance Options>>Visual Effects" to "Adjust for best appearance"
3. If you have Integrated graphics card,please set the UltimateFluid.exe run with the Integrated graphics card.
4. Please add UltimateFluid.exe and CoreHost.exe in App folder Path to your AntiVirus Software's Trust-White-List and Restart computer

Q: Can I use UltimateFluid with WallpaperEngine/RainWallpaper at the same time?
A: YES! Just enable the "Compatibility Mode" option at Tray Icon PopupMenu (Screen Bottom-Right corner,near by your WIFI icon).

Q: How to cancel “TopMost” mode?
A: Just uncheck the "TopMost" option at Tray Icon PopupMenu (Screen Bottom-Right corner,near by your WIFI icon).


Q: How to remove Steam Hook?
A: Right click the UltimateFluid tray icon (Screen Bottom-Right corner,near by your WIFI icon) and select the menu item "Preferences..." ,Uncheck the "Enable Steam Support", Restart UltimateFluid.


Q: How to Exit/Shutdown UltimateFluid?
A:1. You can exit UltimateFluid from tray icon menu "Exit" (Screen Bottom-Right corner,near by your WIFI icon).
2. if can not found the tray icon, please open the system TaskMgr to kill the processes "UltimateFluid.exe"
name: Ultimate Fluid

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 / 8.1 / 8 / 7(with Aero)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
